title: Great value
content: I have a house full of girls and boy have these really come in handy it is a great value for what it comes with and such variety. There's a trio pack and that works just perfectly in my home because everyone has different needs during their time of month and this has been such a perfect Way to help all of the girls with their needs The Tampax pearl I would say is very comfortable it last many hours with no leaks and it's very absorbent
